The gift of spaceflight is a shared perspective. That’s why @virgingalactic called our spaceship, Unity. So, with our next test flight window opening soon and Valentine’s Day just around the corner, we’ve been making space for love, inside our spaceship. https://t.co/1gkm9NTWgB

We know that so many people around the world are separated from loved ones right now. We want to give you the chance to write a message to someone special and we’ll have it nicely designed and printed before stowing it safely aboard Unity ready for her next flight.

We’ll post it back after the flight for you to send on, as a message of inspiration, optimism for the future and most of all – love! We’ll take as many messages as possible, but at some stage we’ll have to close the cabin door, so it’s first come, first served!

RT @TheElders: The Elders condemn Russia's invasion of Ukraine. All steps must be taken to avoid the conflict escalating into a nuclear con…

The world is thinking of the brave people of Ukraine and their armed forces who are putting up one hell of a fight against the Russian invasion force. The least all of us can do is to make sure Putin and those around him pay the price for their aggression.

Sanctions announced so far by the UK, EU & US are welcomed & mark a step in the right direction. But now we must go further. Russia’s leadership, institutions & economy must feel the full force of sanctions. It’s time for the next level, including cutting Russia off from SWIFT.
UK took the first step in banning AEROFLOT from UK airspace. All European countries should follow suit. Private Russian aircraft should also be banned from European airspace.

Putin must be held accountable for his actions – for initiating a war of aggression (crimes against peace) and possibly for targeting civilians, too (war crimes). At very least, he should not be allowed to travel, his assets should be frozen or seized, including his prized yacht
In many Russian cities, brave anti-war protesters are being rounded up and prosecuted. Good to see tens of thousands in cities around the free world taking to the streets in support of Ukraine.

"...legal experts were still trying to determine whether the conflict in Ukraine could be defined as a war." I think we're past that point! All nations should do all they can to support Ukraine. https://t.co/yLJEV0ldCc
Appalling. Putin and those around him must be held accountable for what is happening in Ukraine. https://t.co/hW8OV87OMT

Yes, it’s the weekend. But in Ukraine it’s anything but a weekend. Think for a minute of the children, the mums and dads, the young men and women bravely trying to defend their country, the wounded and the dying. Let all our thoughts be with them all this weekend.

Ukrainians deserve the dignity of sovereignty and peace. The people of Russia deserve the dignity of freedom and liberty. As the world looks for ways to end this war for good and keep the peace, we must find ways to achieve both.

Украинцы заслуживают достоинства иметь суверенитет и мир. Народ России заслуживает достоинства иметь независимость и свободу. Пока мир ищет пути окончательного прекращения этой войны и сохранения мира, мы должны найти способы, как достичь и того, и другого.

Українці заслуговують на гідність мати суверенітет і мир. Народ Росії заслуговує на гідність мати незалежність та свободу. В той час, як світ шукає шляхи припинення цієї війни назавжди і збереження миру, ми маємо знайти шляхи досягнення і того, і іншого.
